dcterms:creator: R. Puglia
dcterms:description: The dataset contains water quality information, collected by means of surveys, each one containing different parameters, such as: average temperature, electric conductivity, medium dissolved oxygen, and pH. The values have been collected from different station probes, located in the Italian Apulia region. Data gathering activities were carried out over five years (from 2008 to 2012) at a fixed pace, i.e., one sample per hour.
dcterms:title: Tiziano Project Dataset
